roleset.name: lower, fall down

roles.note: Verb entry has agent only with collapse.01, and collapse.02 is reserved for financial usages, I don't see any reason why these couldn't be collapsed into one roleset.

role.descr: attribute, when only attribute is collapsing rather than whole

example.name: NP only, Args 1, 2 & TMP
example.text: the 508-point collapse in the Dow Jones Industrial Average on Oct. 19 , 1987 ,
example.arg: in the Dow Jones Industrial Average

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entries collapse.01 & collapse.02, OntoNotes grouping collapse-n senses 1 & 2; maps to VN class other_cos-45.4.

example.name: Medical usage, Arg1 only
example.text: A thoracic puncture caused the collapse of the victim's left lung.

example.name: Arg 4 & MNR
example.text: The dancers practiced a synchronized collapse onto the floor.

example.name: Args 1 & 5
example.text: With OPEC nations in financial trouble due to oil's collapse in price, can they afford not to sell to Israel's supporters?
example.note: Attribute is separate constituent, thus must be annotated separately, whereas "the price of oil" could simply be annotated as arg1.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: With their collapse of a communal framework people can no longer defeat the feelings of insecurity and uncertainty by belonging to a compact whole.

example.name: Args 3 & 4, MNR
example.text: Using a programme designed to analyse voting patterns and statistics, the thinktank found that European policies on human rights enjoyed the support of 72% of UN members a decade ago but only 48% by last year, while the US suffered a steeper collapse from 77% to 30%.
